sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, cast_info ci, movie_info mi
WHERE t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.kind_id  =  7 AND t.production_year  >  1898 AND ci.person_id  =  1007862 AND mi.info_type_id  <  16

 BitmapScan(t)
 Leading((mi (ci t))) */
